PSC (Public Service Commission): Serving his/her nation is a dream of every responsible citizen. Getting shortlisted for PSC job openings and fulfilling job requirements will provide one such opportunity. With a time of job insecurity, exceeded extortion and manipulation government jobs even ensure a guaranteed peace in one’s life. We at MINDLOT provide you such a prospect with which you can build your profile and at the same time stand extremely competent. Following are the coaching batches we have: 
 • Regular Batch 
 • Weekend Batch 
 • Evening Batch 
 We coach each candidate for UPSC, KPSC examinations for various relevant jobs and highlighted profiles including core professional engineering vocation positions. Our Specialties: 
 • Top Class Faculties 
 • OMR Mock tests (twice a month) 
 • Rank list publishing 
 • Free Study materials 
 • Registration and career guidance 
 • Study room facility (separate for Male and Female) 
 • Reference schemes for students.
